title: How do sea monkeys come to life from a packet? - Quora

response.answer_text: The eggs of seamonkies can tolerate drying. There are other creatures that can tollerate drying out as adults. The seamonkies (brine shrimp) are naturally found in salt flats that are prone to drying out, these creatures eggs can tolerate this drying and upon rehydration, will hatch and begin their life cycle. Amazing nature!
